params._amount: Amount of tokens to be borrowed
params._tokenAddr: The address of the token to be borrowed
params._type: Send 1 for variable rate and 2 for fixed rate

deposit(address,uint256).details: User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be deposited
params._tokenAddr: The address of the token to be deposited

payback(address,address,uint256,bool).details: User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be payed back
params._tokenAddr: The address of the token to be paybacked
params._wholeDebt: If true the _amount will be set to the whole amount of the debt

paybackOnBehalf(address,address,uint256,.details: User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be payed back
params._tokenAddr: The address of the token to be paybacked
params._wholeDebt: If true the _amount will be set to the whole amount of the debt

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be withdrawn
params._tokenAddr: The address of the token to be withdrawn
params._wholeAmount: If true we will take the whole amount on chain

params._tokenAddr: Address of the token to be withdrawn

devdoc.title: Basic compound interactions through the DSProxy

borrow(address,uint256,uint256).notice: User borrows tokens to the Aave protocol

deposit(address,uint256).notice: User deposits tokens to the Aave protocol

payback(address,address,uint256,bool).notice: User paybacks tokens to the Aave protocol

paybackOnBehalf(address,address,uint256,.notice: User paybacks tokens to the Aave protocol

withdraw(address,address,uint256,bool).notice: User withdraws tokens from the Aave protocol

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Helper method to withdraw tokens from the DSProxy
